chatbot.evidence: The customer mentioned being frustrated with the chatbot and wanting to speak to a person.
chatbot.description: The customer is complaining about the chatbot being useless and not being able to speak to a person.
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot's functionality and provide an option for customers to speak to a person when needed.

complaint.description: The customer is frustrated with Vodacom's customer service number routing them to the chatbot instead of a person.
complaint.suggestion: Ensure that customers have the option to speak to a person when contacting customer service.

meta.review_title: I want to speak to a person, not a robot!!!!
meta.review_content: I am so frustrated, I just wanna ask how to claim my prize I won through Vodabucks, vodacoms customer service number routes me straight to their useless chatbot!!!! I want to speak to someone, not a robot!!!! I'm afraid I'm running out of time to claim my prize. Sort your customer service out!!!!
